scripts.dev: cd directus && docker compose up -d --remove-orphans --build && cd ../front-end && npm run dev
scripts.db:export: export PGPASSWORD='directus' && cd directus && docker compose up -d meijer-database && sleep 2 && pg_dump --clean -U directus -h 127.0.0.1 -p 5432 -d directus > ./database.sql
scripts.db:import: export PGPASSWORD='directus' && cd directus && docker compose up -d meijer-database && sleep 2 && dropdb directus -h localhost -U directus && createdb directus -h localhost -U directus && psql -U directus -h 127.0.0.1 -p 5432 -d directus < ../database.sql && docker compose down
